summary: Also very dissapointed with the enchantments of the dragonpriest masks, well here is an upgrade for them
descriptionHtml:
this mod should only replace the enchantments, while they still have to be obtained by the dragon priests, if this is not the case, please notify.

The changes i made:

Hevnoraak:
no changes.

Krosis:
+50% Lockpicking, archery and Alchemy instead of 20%.

Morokei:
No changes.

Nahkriin:
+100 Magicka instead of 50.
-50% Restoration and Destruction cost instead of 20%.

Otar:
50% resistance to fire, frost and shock.

Rahgot:
+100 Stamina instead of 70.

Vokun:
-50% Alteration, Conjuration and Illusion instead of 20%.

Volsung:
+50 carry weight instead of 20.
50% better prices instead of 20%.

Konahrik:
Instead of just his own enchantment, this mask now also have the enchantments of all the other masks.

Dragonborn masks not included.
author: Deadyoullbe
